short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A demo trading tool to practice trading in Indian stock market

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Kaagzi is a mock trading app that allows you to enter trading positions for practicing on live market data without staking real money. The look and feel of the app reflects the real world trading apps so as for you to practice and make yourself ready before you jump onto real trading.

Practice trading, try out your strategies, put your knowledge to the test and boost your stock market skills and confidence without worrying about loosing any of your actual capital.
